pageContent: Objectives: Managed care organizations (MCOs) are developing population-based approaches to illnesses with large numbers of patients, wide variations in care and outcomes, and high costs. This is the first survey that evaluates current prostate cancer approaches by MCOs.

metaData.source:
Image-guided radiotherapy for localized prostate cancer: treating a moving target
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18082589/
